title: Beanstalkd Tube Counting
description: Block for visualizing the size of tubes and the workers that are watching them

title: Mongodb Collection Counting
description: Block for visualizing the size of collections and their indexes

title: Visualize checkins as they occur.
description: Block for visualizing the checkins occuring in your app bound by a circle centered at a given lat/lon and radius

title: System tasks
description: View statistics about the number and types of processes running on your server.

title: Memory
description: View statistics about the memory usage on your server.

title: Mongo Server Statistics
description: View statistics about a Mongo server.

title: Mongo Slow Query
description: View stats about the last slow query on a Mongo server.
